changeSet.author: nfleming
changeSet.comment: Store Primer Design, Tissue, and Match Normal references on separate table
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `prodlims`.`rm_primer_design_panel_result_references` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL, `primerDesignReference` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tissueSequencingSampleReference` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, `matchNormalSequencingSampleReference` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `FK_primer_design_result_ref` FOREIGN KEY(`id`) REFERENCES `prodlims`.`sendoutpanelresult`(`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
